channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Pygmy Seahorse Found off Xiaoliuqiu Island for First Time
item.description: A pygmy seahorse has been found in the waters around southern Taiwan's Xiaoliuqiu Island for the very first time.

item.title: Hualien Landslide Blocks Railway After Torrential Rain Drenches Eastern Taiwan
item.description: Eastern Taiwan was hit by heavy rain on Monday, triggering landslides that severed a railway. The east coast was also rocked by a series of earthquakes in the evening.

item.title: Taiwan Power President Resumes Role After Resigning Over Outages
item.description: The head of Taipower, Taiwan's state-owned energy company, will continue in his role after receiving support from top government ministers. He had resigned over the weekend after a

item.title: Taipei Considers Foreign Workers To Fill Bus Driver Shortage
item.description: Taiwan's capital is considering allowing foreign workers into its fleet of public buses as the city faces a shortage of drivers.
